Annual meeting of Nigerian Juche idea study groups held
articles.content:
Annual meeting of Nigerian Juche idea study groups held
    Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Nigerian group for the study of Kimjongilism and the group for the study of Juche philosophy was held in Abuja on Dec. 7 under the sponsorship of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea.
 The meeting reviewed the activities to study and disseminate the Juche idea this year and discussed the issues of raising the function and role of the study groups, making sustained efforts to expand their ranks and intensifying the study and dissemination of the Juche idea in conformity with the inauguration of the national committee for the study of the Juche idea.    
 It discussed the plan to significantly commemorate the 90th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il and the 70th anniversary of the Korean People's Army and conduct a vigorous campaign for solidarity with the Korean people.

articles.content:
DPRK ambassador to Bangladesh appointed
    Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Kang Chang Ryol was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Bangladesh, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Greetings to Sri Lankan prime minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Sri Lankan prime minister
    Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Premier Hong Song Nam of the DPRK cabinet sent a message of greetings to Ranil Wickremesinghe upon his appointment as prime minister of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka.
 The message expresses conviction that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries will grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples and wished him success in his responsible work for the nation's stability and prosperity.
